entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this afternoon then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
